 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָפַץ‎</span> **verb** ==draw together, shut== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***collect, conjoin, tie***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***draw together, contract, withdraw*** (compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 47: ZMG xxxiii (1879), 516</sup>); [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְפַץ‎</span> ***hasten*** (double oneself up in running), **Pi\`el** ***hop, spring***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Ps.77.10|Ps 77:10]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקְפֹּץ‎</span> [[Deut.15.7|Deut 15:7]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְפְּצוּ‎</span> [[Isa.52.15|Isa 52:15]] — ***shut*** hand [[Deut.15.7|Deut 15:7]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> ***away from***, so as not to lend; opp, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פתח‎</span> v[[Deut.15.80|Deut 15:80]]); mouth, in astonishment [[Isa.52.15|Isa 52:15]], in abject silence [[Job.5.16|Job 5:16]]; [[Ps.107.42|Ps 107:42]] figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַחֲמָיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Ps.77.10|Ps 77:10]] ***shut up his compassion.*** **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקָּֽפְצוּן‎</span> [[Job.24.24|Job 24:24]] si vera lectio, ***they draw themselves together***, of contraction in death (compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]; [[BDB#Ol|Ol]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקָּֽבְצוּן‎</span> ***are gathered in***). **Pi\`el** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקַפֵּץ עַלהַֿגְּבָעוֺת‎</span> [[Song.2.8|Song 2:8]] ***springing*** (i.e. making repeated contractions of body, in taking leaps) ***upon the hills*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַלֵּג‎</span>). 

<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֵץ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קצץ‎</span>.
